events.name: Codemkrs SUPER Challenge
events.about:
The Louisiana Technology Council presents Codemkrs SUPER Challenge! In anticipation of Super Bowl XLVII, Codemkrs SUPER Challenge has been organized so software developers can help make New Orleans more tech friendly for those coming in town for the big game.

For 48 hours developers will work together at Peter Mayers headquarters to build web-apps that will be deployed Super Bowl Weekend. The Super Bowl Host Committee is the official prize sponsor and the winning developers can expect great food, fun times, only in NOLA moments, and over the top prizes including tickets the most exclusive Super Bowl events in town.
